item.title: Google text normalization challenge with LSTM encoder/decoder
Spotify playlist recommendation challenge with NeuMF
About
item.description: I’m a machine learning engineer at Wayfair, where I work on competitor product matching at the terabytes of data scale. My team won the Wayfair Hackathon in 2019 with our Clusterbrowse project. I graduated from Dartmouth College, where I studied Computer Science and Cognitive Science. My thesis compared representations learned by various CNN architectures to those of the human ventral visual pathway. Check out my resume.
